en-US.A minimal Enact app demonstrating Spotli: A minimal Enact app demonstrating Spotlight focus, LS2 calls, i18n, and real-time updates.
en-US.Use LEFT/RIGHT to focus buttons, ENTER t: Use LEFT/RIGHT to focus buttons, ENTER to activate.
en-US.Navigate with remote arrows (5‑way). Ite: Navigate with remote arrows (5‑way). Items are Spottable.
en-US.This demo persists locale to localStorag: This demo persists locale to localStorage and updates UI instantly.
en-US.Use your remote’s media keys (Play/Pause: Use your remote’s media keys (Play/Pause, Stop, Rewind, FastForward).

id-ID.A minimal Enact app demonstrating Spotli: Aplikasi Enact minimal yang mendemonstrasikan Spotlight, panggilan LS2, i18n, dan pembaruan real‑time.
id-ID.Use LEFT/RIGHT to focus buttons, ENTER t: Gunakan KIRI/KANAN untuk fokus tombol, ENTER untuk mengeksekusi.
id-ID.Navigate with remote arrows (5‑way). Ite: Navigasi dengan panah remote (5‑arah). Item dapat difokuskan.
id-ID.This demo persists locale to localStorag: Demo ini menyimpan lokal ke localStorage dan memperbarui UI seketika.
id-ID.Use your remote’s media keys (Play/Pause: Gunakan tombol media pada remote (Play/Pause, Stop, Rewind, FastForward).
